message.content:
cs.CR, cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.SY 

This paper deals with security policies and type systems for enforcing security properties in programming languages. It discusses declassification and endorsement mechanisms for relaxing confidentiality and integrity policies, which are relevant to the sub-categories of cryptography (cs.CR), programming languages (cs.PL), logic in computer science (cs.LO), software engineering (cs.SE), and systems and control (cs.SY).
